content:
Statements & Releases			

		Law & Justice	

Issued on:
December 5, 2019
On Thursday, December 5, 2019, the President signed into law:H.R. 5277, which amends current law to allow the Director, Deputy Director, and other specified employees of the U.S. Government Publishing Office to participate in certain diversified investments or employee benefit plans that may hold printing-related interests.
